articles.title: Expect RBI to approach monetary policy normalisation process gradually - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The decline in inflation data for August could reduce the pressure on the RBI to normalise policy. Though retail inflation is at a comfortable range, there are certain risk factors.
articles.content:
Inflation data for August was released this week. Inflation, as measured by the Consumer Price Index (CPI), came as a relief, registering a growth rate of 5.3 percent.
